Reviews.Title: “Super service”
Reviews.Author: MrTall_99
Reviews.Content: location close airport close metro close city arrived 0800 checked meaning didnt wait 6 hours wifi breakfast free gold membership upgrade normal holiday inn clean quiet comfortable bathroom powerful shower rooftop pool deserted nice chance recharge buffet lunch 50 uae little cafe main st metro automatic cafeteria super fresh orange juice 40 uae dubai mall 6 metro stops 16 uae return definitely stay priced gem service superb

Reviews.Content: hi straight forward review lowclass hotel dont book hotel deira bad condition smelly follow advice holiday barsha plenty quality hotels downtown dubai definetely expected arrived manager called india reception treat welcome respect unbelievable imagine arrive late tired reception acts nono front youi cant believe worldclass fivestar hotel hires unexperienced unprofessional receptionist bad smell carpet smell dozens toilet sprayed bathroom dirty furniture falling pieces view book hotel

Reviews.Title: “a decent hotel with a scam at the end”
Reviews.Author: rob_hanson1979
Reviews.Content: flew dubai late hotel night arrangements day taxi couple hotels found holiday inn location fairly close airport 7 minute drive hotel fine nice clean comfortable beds didnt walk offices businesses morning luggage downstairs doorman cab running street bank towncar waiting told didnt towncar taxi regular registered taxi private hotel guests unfortunately shouldve insisted dubai doorman drivers seat yup driving taxi yes price taxi drove port charge 60us wasnt familiar taxi charges dubai nor exchange rate money id hours paid realize cheap taxis dubai regular taxi trip wouldve cost 60 realize partially fault shouldve prepared ahead time exchange rate taxi rates etc doorman lied type car rate charge imagine close airport hotel lot travelers dubai hotel honest anyways decent hotel typical holiday inn head comfortably night nicely careful comes taxi arrangements
